title: Archives, "Raymond Loewy Papers", mid-1940s–early 1960s
dimensions: 2 letter sized boxes, 1 legal sized box
description: This collection, compiled by Betty Reese, Loewy's publicist, consists of newspaper and magazine articles, including the 1949 TIME magazine on which he appeared on the cover.  Other materials include brochures printed by his design firm, and a listing of projects, honors, and memberships.  It contains no original design materials or project files.
